title: Effects of Burning and Photochemical Degradation of Macondo Surrogate Oil on its Composition and Toxicity
content:
Environ. Sci.: Processes Impacts, 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4EM00023D, Paper
Pamela P Benz, Phoebe Zito, Ed Osborn, Aleksandar I. Goranov, Patrick Hatcher, Matthew D Seivert, Wade H. Jeffrey
Petroleum products in the environment can produce significant toxicity through photochemically driven processes. Burning surface oil and photochemical degradation were two mechanisms for oil removal after the Deepwater Horizon (DWH)...
